name: @settlemint/asset-tokenization-kit-artifacts
description: Docker image containing ABIs and Genesis files for Asset Tokenization Kit

scripts.package: echo 'Artifacts package task - ensuring dependencies are ready'
scripts.publish: DOCKER_BUILD_TAG=$(jq -r .version ../../package.json); if [ -z "$CI" ]; then DOCKER_BUILD_TAG="$DOCKER_BUILD_TAG-dev.$(date +%s)"; fi; rm -rf ./.generated && mkdir -p .generated/portal .generated && cp ../contracts/.generated/portal/*.json .generated/portal/ && cp ../contracts/.generated/genesis.json ../contracts/.generated/genesis-allocations.json .generated/ && docker buildx build . --file=./Dockerfile --platform=linux/amd64,linux/arm64 --provenance true --sbom true -t ghcr.io/settlemint/asset-tokenization-kit-artifacts:$DOCKER_BUILD_TAG --push
scripts.test: DOCKER_BUILD_TAG=$(jq -r .version ../../package.json)-test; rm -rf ./.generated && mkdir -p .generated/portal .generated && cp ../contracts/.generated/portal/*.json .generated/portal/ && cp ../contracts/.generated/genesis.json ../contracts/.generated/genesis-allocations.json .generated/ && docker buildx build . --file=./Dockerfile --platform=linux/amd64 --tag asset-tokenization-kit-artifacts:$DOCKER_BUILD_TAG --load
